name: Drone Life
description:
This is my first ever game.

Play as a drone and collect a mineral from a mineral field before returning it to the hatchery. Avoid the zerglings. Return three minerals to win.

Known bugs:
- If you are carrying a mineral and you touch another mineral field, that field will be disappear and no longer be usable. If you touch all the fields in this way, you run out of minerals and cannot win.

- Pressing Quit breaks the game. This button is only for people who download the game.
